actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the insured student loan provisions of the Higher Education Act of 1965 to provide allowances to institutions for their costs in connection with such program.

summary.text: Authorizes the Commission of Education, under the insured student loan provisions of the Higher Education Act of 1965, to provide allowances to institutions of higher education for their costs in connection with such student loans under the Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the insured student loan provisions of the Higher Education Act of 1965 to provide allowances to institutions for their costs in connection with such program.
